text: happy to either send you guys my questions or sit in on the call

Im happy to have on you on the call.  I’ll leave it up to <@U026103R3> in terms agenda. I know we’re going over the brief we wrote, so it might be a good time for questions, or we might get bogged down in that stuff - no idea

personally i'm of the opinion that this call should stay focused on the brief at a high level and the new potential project, and we can set up a separate time for more specific questions. also we are meeting with linda when we go down to visit. if you'd like to ask her some questions beforehand i can try to set up a call with her beforehand - would that work? let me know and i'll try to get that scheduled during or right after tomorrow's check in
<@U0260V1BX>: should i push for a call with Linda sooner than our visit down there? just want to make sure i have all of my agenda items together for tomorrow's call
that would be awesome if we could. if not, its not a huge deal.
i am out starting friday tho

ok all good to know, i'll ask Josh and see if there's any way to jump on a call with her Thursday or even later in the afternoon tomorrow. If not, we'll ask her all of our questions when we're in person next week.
FYI: this is who’s at BL when Im shadowing: L'Oreal Elvive
yes! so sorry for not bubbling that info up (had totally planned to)
Melissa, when you shadow you'll be with B2W <http://Americanas.com|Americanas.com>
